name: FoodHole
description:
The game was created for Nooby Jam

Just a workout for your paltry reaction

  • You have exactly 1 minute to collect as much food as possible
  • Different foods give different amounts of points
  • Catch only unspoiled food. Expired one will remove 50% of your points from you
  • Your best score will be displayed in the Main Menu

P.S. After restarting the game, the values will reset to zero, because there is no data saving here
